citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 15-
SEP-21. The inspector knocked on all doors, waited 30 minutes, and spoke to a neighbor who stated the licensee was
out of the area that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 15-
SEP-21.  The inspector knocked on all doors, waited 30 minutes, and spoke to a neighbor who stated the licensee was 
out of the area that day. 
 
 
 
End Section
